contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement <!-- See Template:Infobox settlement for additional fields and descriptions --> | name = Yomra | image_skyline = | image_caption = | image_shield = | pushpin_map = Turkey | latd = 40 |latm = 58 |lats = |latNS = N |longd = 39 |longm = 54 |longs = |longEW = E | coordinates_display = inline,title | coordinates_format = dms | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = [[Turkey]] | subdivision_type1 = [[Provinces of Turkey|Province]] | subdivision_name1 = [[Trabzon Province|Trabzon]] | subdivision_type2 = | subdivision_name2 = | leader_party = | leader_title = <!-- Mayor --> | leader_name = | leader_title1 = <!-- [[Kaymakam]] --> | leader_name1 = | area_footnotes = {{Turkey district areas|SOURCE}} | area_blank1_title = District | area_blank1_km2 = {{Turkey district areas|Trabzon|Yomra}} | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = {{Turkey district populations|SOURCE|Trabzon}} | population_urban = {{Turkey district populations|Trabzon|Yomra|şehir}} | population_as_of = {{Turkey district populations|YEAR}} | population_blank1_title = District | population_blank1 = {{Turkey district populations|Trabzon|Yomra|toplam}} | population_density_blank1_km2 = auto | postal_code_type = <!-- Post code --> | postal_code = | website = <!-- {{URL|XXXXXXX|XXXXXX}} --> }} '''Yomra''' is a town and district of [[Trabzon Province]] in the [[Black Sea Region, Turkey|Black Sea]] region of [[Turkey]]. The mayor is İbrahim Sağıroğlu ([[Democratic Party (Turkey, current)|DP]]). ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.yomra.gov.tr/ District governor's official website] {{tr icon}} *[http://www.yomra.bel.tr/ District municipality's official website] {{tr icon}} {{Districts of Turkey|provname=Trabzon}} {{BlackSeaTR-geo-stub}} [[Category:Populated places in Trabzon Province]] [[Category:Fishing communities in Turkey]] [[Category:Populated coastal places in Turkey]] [[Category:Yomra| ]] [[Category:Districts of Trabzon Province]]
